description: This file defines a stateless Flutter widget called EmptyState, which displays an icon, a message, and an optional action widget, typically used to show an empty state in the UI.

classes.name: EmptyState
classes.description: A Flutter widget that displays a centered icon, message, and optional action for empty state UI.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the EmptyState widget, including icon, message, and optional action button.
